title: TCT Clip: "This stuff is not dead, you know!" - Malcolm Guite on his love of the King Arthur stories
description:
A wonderful moment from my chat with poet Malcolm Guite. He talks about his life-long romance with the King Arthur legend, the futile hacking of the Glastonbury thorn, and the stories that can't be stamped out.

Our full conversation: https://youtu.be/PiEZt_e6V08
